mapper.select: SELECT s.id sid, s.name sname, s.email email, d.name dname, s.phone phone FROM student s, department d WHERE d.dseq = s.dseq AND s.id=#{sid}
SELECT s.id sid, s.name sname, s.email semail, d.name dname, s.phone phone FROM student s, department d WHERE d.dseq = s.dseq
SELECT pwd FROM student WHERE id=#{sid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO student(id,name, email, dseq, phone, pwd) VALUES(#{sid}, #{sname}, #{email}, #{dseq}, #{phone}, #{pwd})
mapper.update: UPDATE student SET email=#{email}, phone=#{phone} WHERE id=#{sid}
